title: Two men in center, including man on left wearing dark robe, light colored button down shirt, and eyeglasses, holding document, man on right wearing dark suit, light colored button down collared shirt and pocket scarf, dark striped necktie, and eyeglasses, holding document in front of microphone,  standing in raised box with American flag and wreath of flowers marked DBR, in interior with group of men, decorative sleigh in background, streamers on ceiling, and Season sign on right
